column4: when ubuntu is installed is the windows master boot recored overwritten?
yep and u need to recover windows for that ...
do you need the windows install disk to return the master boot record to what it was before the install?
u want to dual boot ?
yeah but im afraid im gonna mess it up and not be able to fix the mbr
dont b i have .. fixed them a lot of times :P
yeah but i dont' have the windows install cd.  Can i fix it without that?
yeah just hang on
yeah, I havent worked up enough guts to install it though lol
also how hard it is to set ubuntu as my default though the new linux mbr?
u need to install startup-manager from the synaptic manager
can i install that after i install ubuntu?
ok cool
that is to be installed only after installing u ubuntu
can you turn the timout off for choosing an operating system?
well not turn it off, just have it automatically go to one operating system
if u select none when it asks u .. it will automatically load the default one
can i just set one as the primary so there is no countdown?

its difficult to tell step by step so here is the link u shld read them and follow the steps .. the steps for recovering ubuntu after windows or recovering  windows after ubuntu are almost same https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RecoveringUbuntuAfterInstallingWindows
ok thanks
if u set that then there's no need for dual bot .. just have ubuntu or windows and delete the other os
